meanings.definition: A person who is able to communicate thoughts or ideas to others without the use of verbal or written language.
meanings.sent1: The telepath could understand what others were thinking without them saying a word.
meanings.sent2: She believed she had a telepath in her group of friends who could read minds.
meanings.sent3: The telepath made a game out of guessing what people were thinking at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition was so strong, it was as if she had a telepathic connection to those around her.
meanings.sent5: The telepath's ability to communicate without words was truly remarkable.
